naslov: Kuća u izgradnji s više apartmana Mrkopalj (prodaja)
opis: Samostojeća kuća u rohbau sistemu,.Mirno okruženje, među lijepo izgrađenim kućama. Prilazna cesta asfaltirana, Priključak struje, vode, kanalizacije. Na terenu postavljen kontejner koji služi kao apartman sa velikom terasom ispred i velikim kaminom. U suterenu podrum 30 m². U prizemlju garaža, dio stana i apartman od cca 50 m². U visokom potkrovlju 3 sobe, kupaona, i dva apartmana cca 30 m² s galerijama. Krovište sve u drvetu. Stolarija ugrađena u visokom potkrovlju. Krov vanjska izolacija 20 cm, lindab topcoat crni lim. Krovište je izgrađeno vrhunskim materijalima, izolacija je staklena vuna radi boljeg upijanja zvuka, tri sloja folija, Kuća ima kompletnu infrastrukturu. Dimnjaci Schiedel. Više info na geofly.immobilien@gmail.com ili 095 829 1188 ENG Detached house in unfinished system, .Quiet environment, among beautifully built houses. Asphalt access road, electricity, water, sewage connection. On the ground there is a container that serves as an apartment with a large terrace in front and a large fireplace. Basement 30 m2 in the basement. On the ground floor garage, part of the apartment and an apartment of about 50 m2. In the high attic 3 bedrooms, bathroom, and two apartments of about 30 m2 with galleries. Roofing all in wood. Carpentry installed in the high attic. Roof exterior insulation 20 cm, lindab topcoat black sheet metal. The roof is built with top quality materials, the insulation is glass wool for better sound absorption, three layers of foil, The house has a complete infrastructure. Schiedel chimneys.
